TopicTitle: SCF Home base + 7/8/15 Spacecraft friday [Looking for you!]

Articles.Content:
![kn81KUd.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/kn81KUd.jpg)

A while ago, somebody suggested a spacecraft Thursday. I got to thinking about that, and I decided to do it myself! Only on Friday, because I have more time for KSP on Friday.

When I supported it, I thought it would be easy, but it is not. I set threads to display to last week only, and in my first cut, I had at least 15 craft. All of them were awesome, but a narrowed it down to what I think are the 5 best craft. I'm not going to have more than one craft by a single builder, and I'll make sure to have at least one craft by a new builder.

Who are you to decide this, I hear you asking, and here's the answer: No one. I was not elected, I just decided to do it. If you're unhappy with my decision, we can work something out. This is just my opinion, since there's no objective way to judge "Quality" of crafts.

If anyone feels that their craft is missed because of any kind of time-zone difference, or any kind of difference in when spacecraft fridays is put up, tell me.

If your craft is really good and was made before, and someone posts in it within that week, then it will be considered. Just to clarify, I am not encouraging necros for the sake of bumping your craft.

This works on a first come, first serve basis, and if the person on the top can't do it, the person right below will do it. If you want to do it, remember, I will only taking submissions on this thread, not on the week's list.

**Maintainer list:**

**Rules for maintainers:**

1. Don't use your own crafts. Not because they're not good, but because people will feel like you're trying to get attention with it.

2. Don't pick two craft from one builder.

3. Try not to just pick from a small group of builders every week.

4. 5 to 10 craft is about right.

5. To decide maintainers, we will have a first come, first serve system.

6. Try to test stuff, but it's not necessary.

7. If you have extra time, you can select single craft from showcases, following the same rules as normal craft.

8. Add this to the top of your page:

Spoiler

So, I give to you, in no particular order:

The week's top spacecraft!

[**RevanCorana's Whirlwind:**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/130875-Whirlwind-VTOL-Dogfighter)

![ksp_whirlwind_fighter_vtol_by_revancorana-d93qdcx.jpg](http://pre14.deviantart.net/00e9/th/pre/i/2015/213/d/5/ksp_whirlwind_fighter_vtol_by_revancorana-d93qdcx.jpg)

This extremely acrobatic <abbr title="Vertical Take-Off and Landing"><abbr title="Vertical Take-Off and Landing"><abbr title="Vertical Take-Off and Landing"><abbr title="Vertical Take-Off and Landing">VTOL</abbr></abbr></abbr></abbr> has many features that make it stand out as a extra-special craft. The clever engine design is of particular interest, it uses a clipped pre-cooler for a fan effect.

The compact missles are very accurate, and the bomb is a, I believe, unique design.

[**Zais' Class L "Say my name" lifters:**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/130764-The-Class-L-Say-My-Name-lifters)

<iframe frameborder="0" height="550" width="100%"></iframe>

Something that we don't have enough of on the Spacecraft exchange: Lifters! These are exemplary in many ways: Cost, part count, and ease of use. I hope that Zais will release many more craft in the future.

[**renePRO's Roller Coaster:**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/130874-Roller-Coaster%21%21%21-Have-a-nice-ride-%29)

<iframe allowfullscreen="true" frameborder="0" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/FosBIf4e7wI?feature=oembed" width="480"></iframe>

I didn't DL this since it has mods, but there's a video, so just watch that and be blown away.

[**Rune's Base-In-A-Box:**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/130016-Base-In-A-Box-Expandable-modular-surface-base%21)

[![Vp6ZMYl.png](http://i.imgur.com/Vp6ZMYl.png)](http://i.imgur.com/Vp6ZMYl.png "Enlarge image")

This is just legendary. Nothing else need be said.

[**FlipNascar's MiK 29:**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/130365-MiG-29-Replica-89-of-the-finest-parts-cobbled-together)

[![HJbmCF6.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/HJbmCF6.jpg)](http://i.imgur.com/HJbmCF6.jpg "Enlarge image")

The Mik 29 is a truly beautiful aircraft, FlipNascar did a awesome job on the joint between the cockpit and the fuselage. The handling is superb, buzz the tower with it!

[**Majorjim's At-ST:**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/129518-Detailed-StarWars-AT-ST-static-craft)

[![11ltt6t.jpg](http://i62.tinypic.com/11ltt6t.jpg)](http://i62.tinypic.com/11ltt6t.jpg "Enlarge image")

This thing is... just incredible. I could swear it's not stock, but it is. How does it balance? The magic of Majorjim's building! You'll never look at the science tab the same way again.

That's it, thanks for reading!

**Edited <time datetime="2016-08-14T01:37:22Z" title="08/14/2016 01:37  AM" data-short="7 yr">August 14, 2016</time> by Mad Rocket Scientist**
I already gave you rep for something else so I am writing here about how awesome this is and hope to feature one friday!

Well then, I guess it's time i start shipping creations to the Spacecraft Exchange instead of the Work-In-Progress design thread. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

As I said early, I really like that type of design in the aircrafts. And Rune's modular base it's just amazing, I'm already thinking of try to build my own inspirated by him, but it seems just too complicated. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

I'm new to the forum, but you guys are making me feel just like I'm in my home, I have to say thank you for that and I have to say thanks to you Mad Rocket Scientist, for having this really cool idea to show more the work of all of us to the forum, that motivates us to do more.

> 
> I'm already working on the Say My Name Mk2, it will be nine capacities of 5, 10, 20, 40, 60, 80, 100, 120 and 150. And I'm doing some tweaks in the design.

Last but not least, how can I create a spoiler? Hehehe ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
